articles.title: Swiss authorities investigate bar managers after deadly New Year blaze
articles.summary: Geneva/Crans-Montana, Switzerland â€“ The managers of the Swiss ski resort bar where dozens died during a fire at a New Year's celebration are under investigation for negligent manslaughter, authorities said Saturday. French couple Jacques and Jessica Moretti owned and managed Le Constellation bar in Crans-Montana, which was crammed with young partygoers when a blaze began in a packed basement at around 1:30 a.m. on Thursday. articles.title: Ethiopia : Gambella in Turmoil Amid Hunger , Influx of Refugees From Neighboring
articles.summary: A humanitarian catastrophe is set to unfold in the southern region of Gambella as the federal government deploys troops to help subdue intense violence and unrest that residents and aid workers in the area say stems from rapidly deteriorating living conditions.
